attributes.action: Pay a Bounty of £1000 for the Capture and Deportation of Illegal Immigrants
attributes.additional_details: That the UK Goverment should pay its Legal Citizens a bounty of £1000 for each Illegal Immigrant that is Identified located or discovered by them and removed from the United Kingdom. This would speed up and increase the amount of illegals being removed in line with Goverment targets, saving UK tax payers money and allow for an increase in employment within local communities, freeing up housing, education places, employment and reducing benefit and commerce fraud as well as general and serious crime figures.
